title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 54.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 54.1 - Application

State Regulations

Except as otherwise specifically provided, this Part
applies to all skiers and ski areas to which article 26 of the Labor Law and
article 18 of the General Obligations Law apply, and to the owners and
operators of such areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
54.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
